statements: SELECT influencer_id, content_preference, audience_demographics FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE influencer_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT * FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE content_preference = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_id, content_preference FROM InfluencerAnalysis ORDER BY influencer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE audience_demographics ->> 'age' > '25';
SELECT influencer_id, content_preference FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE influencer_id IN ('12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678', '87654321-4321-8765-4321-876543218765');
SELECT influencer_id, content_preference, audience_demographics FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT influencer_id, content_preference FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE content_preference = 'Fashion' ORDER BY influencer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE audience_demographics -> 'age_group' = '18-24' AND content_preference LIKE '%Beauty%'
SELECT influencer_id, content_preference, audience_demographics FROM InfluencerAnalysis WHERE content_preference LIKE '%Lifestyle%' ORDER BY influencer_id ASC
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(*) FROM InfluencerAnalysis GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM influencer_content_preferences;
SELECT content_type, likes_count FROM influencer_content_preferences ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, audience_age_range, audience_location FROM influencer_content_preferences WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS audience_count FROM audience_demographics GROUP BY location HAVING audience_count > 2;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, audience_age_range, audience_location, likes_count FROM influencer_content_preferences WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM influencer_content_preferences WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, audience_location FROM influencer_content_preferences WHERE content_type = 'Fashion' AND audience_location = 'New York';
SELECT a.influencer_id, a.age, a.gender, b.content_type FROM audience_demographics a INNER JOIN influencer_content_preferences b ON a.influencer_id = b.influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes_count) AS total_likes FROM influencer_content_preferences GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_likes > 1000 ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_preferences;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, engagement_rate FROM influencer_preferences WHERE content_type = 'Fashion';
SELECT audience_id, age, gender, location FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT influencer_id, audience_id, likes, comments FROM content_engagement WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT audience_id, interest FROM audience_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_preferences WHERE influencer_id = 1;
SELECT influencer_id, content_type, engagement_rate FROM influencer_preferences WHERE content_type = 'Fashion';
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(shares) AS total_shares FROM content_engagement GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;

SELECT i.influencer_id, i.content_type, a.age, a.location, c.likes, c.comments FROM influencer_preferences i JOIN content_engagement c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id JOIN audience_demographics a ON c.audience_id = a.audience_id WHERE i.content_type = 'Fitness' AND a.age >= 18;
SELECT id, name, followers FROM influencers WHERE followers > 1000
SELECT * FROM audience_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 30
SELECT name, post_text, likes FROM influencer_posts ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT id, location FROM audience_demographics WHERE age < 18 OR age > 65
SELECT influencer_id, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM influencer_posts GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING total_posts > 5
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 100000 ORDER BY followers DESC
SELECT name, followers FROM influencers WHERE content_preferences = 'Fashion' ORDER BY followers DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, age, gender FROM audience_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 35 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT post_text, likes, comments FROM influencer_posts WHERE likes > 500 ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_id, like_status, comment_status, share_status FROM audience_interactions WHERE like_status = TRUE AND comment_status = TRUE ORDER BY post_id ASC
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category, location FROM influencers WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT influencer_name, total_posts, engagement_rate FROM influencers JOIN influencer_stats ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_stats.influencer_id;

SELECT influencer_name, preference_name, preference_category FROM influencers JOIN content_preferences ON influencers.influencer_id = content_preferences.influencer_id WHERE preference_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, content_preferences.preference_name FROM influencers INNER JOIN content_preferences ON influencers.influencer_id = content_preferences.influencer_id WHERE content_preferences.preference_category = 'Fashion';

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, audience_demographics.age_group, audience_demographics.country FROM influencers INNER JOIN audience_demographics ON influencers.influencer_id = audience_demographics.influencer_id WHERE audience_demographics.country = 'USA' ORDER BY audience_demographics.age_group ASC;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, influencer_stats.total_posts, influencer_stats.engagement_rate FROM influencers INNER JOIN influencer_stats ON influencers.influencer_id = influencer_stats.influencer_id WHERE influencer_stats.engagement_rate > 5.0;

SELECT influencers.influencer_name, content_performance.performance_metric, content_performance.performance_value FROM influencers INNER JOIN content_performance ON influencers.influencer_id = content_performance.influencer_id WHERE content_performance.performance_value < 0.5 ORDER BY content_performance.performance_value DESC;
